name: whitey
text: A comment left by whitey was marked as spam and excluded. whitey: What a douche. (reported by jstegall, jamers, Magb)

name: chaesar
text: Like Icarus, who flew too high...

name: spinynorman
text: The best laid plans of mice and fried potato slices...

name: mnemon
text: A chubby for you sir!

name: soticoto
text: Weebl's standards of education have informed me that it became what it is by making this sort of mistake in the first place.

name: senseihollywood
text: A comment left by senseihollywood was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by NaughtyByN8ture, hcaz, aHatOfPig, Garyos)

name: spectre
text: Alt text: "It was just a simple backside air." What the HELL, people?

name: fineoakstructure
text: "Backside air" is the name of a skateboard "manouver."  Essentially, it means turning in the direction that your toes are pointing (or, your back is facing the forward direction).  Also, in this case, we learn from the motion in the strip that french fry appears to be regular-footed, not goofy.

name: farqussus
text: "manoeuvre"

name: farqussus
text: or, apparently, maneuver.

name: fineoakstructure
text:
Look man, I know , don't you think I know? I die inside just a little bit every time I see this comment again. Man, I ain't wanna become known on AssetBar as the guy who's always posting two replies under his own comments fixing the same spelling mistake twice. Do you know how many times I've done that?

Hey wait you just did that.

name: farqussus
text:
Are you suggesting I'm known on Assetbar?

swoon

name: fineoakstructure
text: Oh defintely!  Wait, are you the guy who lamed people for posting the alt text without knowing that alt text wasn't available on assetbar in the early days?  Or was that rowboat?  I always get you mixed up with rowboat.

name: farqussus
text:
NOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!!!!!!!!


Goddammit everyone had forgotten!

I apologised everywhere I did it.

Goddamn it.

Well, if I'm known as an ass, an ass I shall be!

name: fineoakstructure
text:
Man, you should've just said that it was rowboat.

Don't worry, I think of you as an assetbar regular, and in the "good regular" category.

name: farqussus
text: Rowboat trawls these old pages too. I'd be scuppered!

name: saint
text: it could me worse.

name: saint
text: ...ah that works too.

name: i_love_kate
text: Did anyone else laugh at "Backside air" and then immediately feel a deep, inexplicable shame?

name: snowman
text: I wouldn't call it inexplicable.

name: bemyfamily
text: No, and yes.

name: greenkoolayd
text: backside air=a fart.  haha!

name: farqussus
text: God, haven't you played ANY of the Tony Hawk franchise?

name: fineoakstructure
text:
You know, I haven't played any skating video game since Skate or Die on a PSII...and I mean the old IBM machine, not a playstation.

I knew it by actually skateboarding.

name: i_love_kate
text: As if you think that's any less embarrassing.

name: fineoakstructure
text: Skateboarding is awesome and you'd be a damn fool if you didn't reconsider your position.

name: i_love_kate
text: I guess I better recognise.

name: fineoakstructure
text: Word.

name: shoinan
text:
And they say fast-food is killing children?

Someone needs to think about the fast-food!

name: lawdog
text: Philippe, the Equalizer.

name: woodenteeth
text: When pulling illegal air down at your local bath tub, please, PLEASE watch out for the faucet.

name: godfatherofsouls
text: i just think it's cute that the french fry with the shoe is saying 'I look just like a skater!'

name: aurorasbored
text: I have to say for all the demises I imagined during this arc....I did not call backside air.

name: endoftheworld
text: This is right up there with Calvin and the baby raccoon.

name: brynito
text: That was a fantastic story line! Onstad is definitely of Wattersonian calliber. well played.

name: baryonyx
text:
Humor me.

This strip makes me imagine an Achewood Ragnarok in which Philippe destroys the Red Skate in such a way that makes some kind of allegorical statement.

name: bixschmix
text: PARGON PARGON PARGON

name: deusoma
text: I only just noticed for the first time that French Fry is skating in a bathtub.

name: shutup_shutup
text: Are we entirely certain it's not a sink?

name: charchar
text: I am getting flashbacks to freshman year...so much grindage...

name: i_love_kate
text: *tugging on collar, fanning self*

name: coco
text: French fry . . . NOOOOO!!!

name: snowman
text: The french fry is standing on a little box, just like he was visiting a real tailor!

name: hamscout
text:
He shoulda hadda double stitch!

Atsa some-a strong-a steetch, you bet!

name: tekende
text: Now why would I want double-stitch? To pad your account, that's why. No, single-stitch will be fine.

name: miku224
text: What the heck, he such a nice man.  I'm going to give him a double-stitch anyway.

name: hairymoonstone
text: I've always hated the tap end of the bath. Sod the taps man!

name: kikineko
text: The french fry can make a good model, being all tall and skinny...

name: kikineko
text: The french fry can make a good model, being all tall and skinny...

name: tekende
text: You're frightened of not being heard, aren't you?

name: hendetta
text:
In the most recent book, under this strip, Onstad's annotation describes what I think is supposed to be the true saddest thing.

"Charlie Brown finally kicks that football, only instead of a football, its the Little Red-Haired Girl's severed head, and right before the kick, she's about to say "I'll always love you."
